product_name: LancomeBi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover Duo Limited Edition Holiday Gift Set
summary: SummaryLanc√¥me Bi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover Duo Gift Set includes our bestselling makeup remover that instantly and effortlessly removes waterproof makeup.
details: DetailsIncludesBi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover (6.7 oz)Bi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover (4.2 oz)BenefitsRemoves all types of makeup, even waterproof.The bi-phase makeup remover contains an oily phase and a water phase to remove stubborn makeup without irritation or greasy feel.The oily phase uses a lipid concentrate to loosen and lift eye makeup, while the water phase uses unique emollients to leave skin feeling perfectly cleansed.Suitable for all skin typesGentle enough for sensitive skin and contact lens wearers.Item 2645204How To UseBefore each use, shake the bottle to activate the makeup-removing formula and mix the two phases.Saturate a cotton round with the gentle makeup remover and hold over closed eyes to moisten and soften makeup.Gently swipe to remove.Repeat until all eye makeup has been cleansed away.Pro tip: Dab Bi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover onto a cotton swab to fix makeup application mistakes.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isohexadecane, Sodium Chloride, Poloxamer 184, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzalkonium Chloride, Geraniol, Disodium Phosphate, Disodium Edta, Potassium Phosphate, Citronellol, Hexylene Glycol, Parfum / Fragrance (F.I.L. B244918/1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Before each use, shake the bottle to activate the makeup-removing formula and mix the two phases.Saturate a cotton round with the gentle makeup remover and hold over closed eyes to moisten and soften makeup.Gently swipe to remove.Repeat until all eye makeup has been cleansed away.Pro tip: Dab Bi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover onto a cotton swab to fix makeup application mistakes.
